main_definition: The concept or action of measuring the space between two points, objects, or locations.

meanings_and_examples.example: Due to COVID-19, I can't visit my family because of the distances involved.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Emotional or relational gap between people
meanings_and_examples.example: There was a great deal of tension and distance in their relationship after the argument.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Time taken to travel from one place to another
meanings_and_examples.example: The journey will take approximately three hours by car, which is quite a distance away.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Separation or division in various contexts (e.g., businesses separating assets during divorce)
meanings_and_examples.example: In the divorce settlement, they had to divide their assets and properties carefully due to the distances between them.
